column2: Mrs. Deadpool and the Howling Commandos (2015) #3
column6: Shiklah and the Howling Commandos travel to WEIRDWORLD...and must battle their way through the Temple of the Manticore! And how will the Monster Metropolis survive Dracula's wrath?
